languages.text: "Дракон — первый клинок кабала Опустошительной бури. И тот, кто лишь на ступеньку ниже архонта. Дракон возглавляет рейды и войны с другими кабалами, держит в страхе спесивых истиннорожденных и выскочек из полуродков, имеет право на любого противника в любом бою. Когда-то у Иремерисс были и другие приближенные... но я позаботился о том, чтобы они постепенно исчезли, а новые кандидаты слишком боялись занять их место. Тогда-то моя сестра и связалась с орденом инкубов, которые стали ее телохранителями. Эти... не поддаются ни страху, ни подкупу".

"The Dracon is the first among the blades of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, and the Drukhari who stands but one rung below the Archon. The Dracon leads raids and wages wars against other Kabals, keeps the arrogant Trueborn and half-born upstarts at bay, and has the pick of any opponent in any battle. Yremeryss used to have others in her inner circle... but I ensured that they all disappeared, one by one, and that their successors were too terrified to take their place. That was when my sister engaged an Incubi Order to serve as her bodyguards. Incubi... do not respond to fear or bribes."
languages.original_text: "Дракон — первый клинок кабала Опустошительной бури. И тот, кто лишь на ступеньку ниже архонта. Дракон возглавляет рейды и войны с другими кабалами, держит в страхе спесивых истиннорожденных и выскочек из полуродков, имеет право на любого противника в любом бою. traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «El Dracón es el primer espadachín de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora y el Drukhari que está un paso por debajo del Arconte. El Dracón lidera incursiones y libra guerras contra otras Kábalas, mantiene a los advenedizos a raya, sean Legítimos o Semigestados, y puede elegir oponente en cualquier batalla. Yremeryss solía tener a otros en su Círculo Interior... pero yo me aseguré de que fueran desapareciendo uno a uno y de que sus sucesores estuvieran demasiado aterrados como para ocupar el puesto. Fue entonces cuando mi hermana contrató a la orden de los Íncubos para que le sirvieran de guardaespaldas. Los Íncubos... no responden al miedo ni al soborno».
languages.original_text: "The Dracon is the first among the blades of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, and the Drukhari who stands but one rung below the Archon. The Dracon leads raids and wages wars against other Kabals, keeps the arrogant Trueborn and half-born upstarts at bay, and has the pick of any opponent in any battle. Yremeryss used to have others in her inner circle... but I ensured that they all disappeared, one by one, and that their successors were too terrified to take their place. That was when my sister engaged an Incubi Order to serve as her bodyguards. Incubi... do not respond to fear or bribes."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “裁决官是狂风阴谋团的首席利刃，仅仅位居执政官之下。裁决官负责领导劫掠，以及与其他阴谋团之间的战争，让那些傲慢的嫡脉与新晋支脉不敢轻举妄动。无论是在什么样的战斗中，裁决官都有权挑选对手。伊芮梅莉斯的核心圈子里以前还有别人……但我让他们一个接一个都消失了，他们的继任者也吓得不敢接替位置。也就是那个时候，我姐姐雇佣了一支梦魇密会作为她的保镖。梦魇……不会被恐惧或贿赂影响。”
languages.original_text: "The Dracon is the first among the blades of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, and the Drukhari who stands but one rung below the Archon. The Dracon leads raids and wages wars against other Kabals, keeps the arrogant Trueborn and half-born upstarts at bay, and has the pick of any opponent in any battle. Yremeryss used to have others in her inner circle... but I ensured that they all disappeared, one by one, and that their successors were too terrified to take their place. That was when my sister engaged an Incubi Order to serve as her bodyguards. Incubi... do not respond to fear or bribes."

traits.locale_text: “裁决官是狂风阴谋团的首席利刃，仅仅位居执政官之下。裁决官负责领导劫掠，以及与其他阴谋团之间的战争，让那些傲慢的嫡脉与新晋支脉不敢轻举妄动。无论是在什么样的战斗中，裁决官都有权挑选对手。伊芮梅莉斯的核心圈子里以前还有别人……但我让他们一个接一个都消失了，他们的继任者也吓得不敢接替位置。也就是那个时候，我妹妹雇佣了一支梦魇密会作为她的保镖。梦魇……不会被恐惧或贿赂影响。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ドラコンは、陰謀団『略奪の嵐』の刃の中で最初のものであり、アーコンより一段下に立つデュカーリだ。ドラコンは襲撃を先導し、他の陰謀団に対して戦争を仕掛け、傲慢なトゥルーボーンとハーフボーンの成り上がり者を抑え込み、戦う相手は常に彼が選ぶ。イレメリスの執行会のかつての顔ぶれは今と全く違っていた…全員が間違いなくひとりひとり消えること、そして後任につくことを誰もが恐れるよう、俺が指示したのだ。それは、妹がボディーガードとしてインキュバス修道会と契約したときのことだった。インキュバスは…恐怖や賄賂には動じない」
languages.original_text: "The Dracon is the first among the blades of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, and the Drukhari who stands but one rung below the Archon. The Dracon leads raids and wages wars against other Kabals, keeps the arrogant Trueborn and half-born upstarts at bay, and has the pick of any opponent in any battle. Yremeryss used to have others in her inner circle... but I ensured that they all disappeared, one by one, and that their successors were too terrified to take their place. That was when my sister engaged an Incubi Order to serve as her bodyguards. Incubi... do not respond to fear or bribes."

traits.locale_text: 「ドラコンは、陰謀団『略奪の嵐』の刃の中で最初のものであり、アーコンより一段下に立つデュカーリだ。ドラコンは襲撃を先導し、他の陰謀団に対して戦争を仕掛け、傲慢なトゥルーボーンとハーフボーンの成り上がり者を抑え込み、戦う相手は常に彼が選ぶ。イレメリスの執行会のかつての顔ぶれは今と全く違っていた…全員が間違いなくひとりひとり消えること、そして後任につくことを誰もが恐れるよう、俺が指示したのだ。それは、妹がボディーガードとしてインキュバス修道会と契約したときのことだった。インキュバスは…恐怖や賄賂には動じない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Le dracon est la première lame de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse, et le bras droit de l'archonte. Il mène les raids et fait la guerre à ses rivales, il tient en respect les Immaculés et les demi-sang un peu trop ambitieux et il a le privilège de choisir ses adversaires au combat. Yremeryss avait d'autres affidés dans son cercle intime... mais je me suis arrangé pour les faire disparaître les uns après les autres et pour dissuader leurs successeurs de prendre leur place. En réaction, ma sœur a engagé un ordre d'Incubes en tant que garde rapprochée. Car, voyez-vous, ces créatures sont insensibles à la peur et à la corruption. »
languages.original_text: "The Dracon is the first among the blades of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, and the Drukhari who stands but one rung below the Archon. The Dracon leads raids and wages wars against other Kabals, keeps the arrogant Trueborn and half-born upstarts at bay, and has the pick of any opponent in any battle. Yremeryss used to have others in her inner circle... but I ensured that they all disappeared, one by one, and that their successors were too terrified to take their place. That was when my sister engaged an Incubi Order to serve as her bodyguards. Incubi... do not respond to fear or bribes."

traits.locale_text: « Le dracon est la première lame de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse, et le bras droit de l'archonte. Il mène les raids et fait la guerre à ses rivales, il tient en respect les Immaculés et les demi-sang un peu trop ambitieux et il a le privilège de choisir ses adversaires au combat. Yremeryss avait d'autres affidés dans son cercle intime... mais je me suis arrangé pour les faire disparaître les uns après les autres et pour dissuader leurs successeurs de prendre leur place. En réaction, ma sœur a engagé un ordre d'Incubes en tant que garde rapprochée. Car, voyez-vous, ces créatures sont insensibles à la peur et à la corruption. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Der Dracon ist die erste unter den Klingen der Kabale des plündernden Sturms und der Drukhari, der nur eine Stufe unter dem Archonten steht. Der Dracon führt Angriffe an und führt Kriege gegen andere Kabale, hält die arroganten Fleischgeborenen und die Emporkömmlinge von Halbgeborenen im Zaum, und kann sich in jedem Kampf einen beliebigen Gegner aussuchen. Yremeryss hatte früher andere in ihrem inneren Zirkel ... doch ich habe dafür gesorgt, dass sie alle verschwinden, einer nach dem anderen, und dass ihre Nachfolger zu verängstigt waren, um ihren Platz einzunehmen. Da hat meine Schwester einen Incubus-Orden zu ihrer Leibgarde gemacht. Incubi ... reagieren weder auf Angst noch auf Bestechung."
languages.original_text: "The Dracon is the first among the blades of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, and the Drukhari who stands but one rung below the Archon. The Dracon leads raids and wages wars against other Kabals, keeps the arrogant Trueborn and half-born upstarts at bay, and has the pick of any opponent in any battle. Yremeryss used to have others in her inner circle... but I ensured that they all disappeared, one by one, and that their successors were too terrified to take their place. That was when my sister engaged an Incubi Order to serve as her bodyguards. Incubi... do not respond to fear or bribes."

languages.original_text: "The Dracon is the first among the blades of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, and the Drukhari who stands but one rung below the Archon. The Dracon leads raids and wages wars against other Kabals, keeps the arrogant Trueborn and Half-Born upstarts at bay, and has the pick of any opponent in any battle. Yremeryss used to have others in her inner circle... but I ensured that they all disappeared, one by one, and that their successors were too terrified to take their place. That was when my sister engaged an Incubi Order to serve as her bodyguards. Incubi... do not respond to fear or bribes."

languages.text: "Drakon, Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı kılıçlarının ilki ve Arkon'un bir kademe altındaki Drukhari'dir. Baskınlara önderlik edip başka Kaballara savaş açmak, Drakon'un görevidir. Çıkıntılık eden Saltdoğanları, yarıdoğanları hizaya getirir. İstediği savaşta istediğiyle karşılaşır. Yremeryss'in yakın çevresinde başka isimler de vardı... Sayemde hepsi birer birer ayrıldı. Veliahtları da korkudan görevi devralamadı. Ablamın bir İnkubus Tarikatı'nı kendine koruma yapmaya çalıştığı zamanlardı. Karabasan da malum... Ne korkar ne de rüşvetten anlar."
languages.original_text: "The Dracon is the first among the blades of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, and the Drukhari who stands but one rung below the Archon. The Dracon leads raids and wages wars against other Kabals, keeps the arrogant Trueborn and half-born upstarts at bay, and has the pick of any opponent in any battle. Yremeryss used to have others in her inner circle... but I ensured that they all disappeared, one by one, and that their successors were too terrified to take their place. That was when my sister engaged an Incubi Order to serve as her bodyguards. Incubi... do not respond to fear or bribes."

traits.locale_text: "Drakon, Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı kılıçlarının ilki ve Arkon'un bir kademe altındaki Drukhari'dir. Baskınlara önderlik edip başka Kaballara savaş açmak, Drakon'un görevidir. Çıkıntılık eden Saltdoğanları, yarıdoğanları hizaya getirir. İstediği savaşta, istediğiyle karşılaşır. Yremeryss'in yakın çevresinde başka isimler de vardı... Sayemde hepsi birer birer ayrıldı. Veliahtları da korkudan görevi devralamadı. Ablamın bir Karabasan Tarikatı'nı kendine koruma yapmaya çalıştığı zamanlardı. Karabasan da malum... Ne korkar ne de rüşvetten anlar."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
